data.news_body:
Outcome of Board Meeting held on Saturday, 28th January, 2023 and Submission of Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2022 as per SEBI (Listing
Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure On Related Party Transaction Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit the attached disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended on 30th September, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company And Limited Review Report For The First Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2022
data.news_body:
With reference to above, we are pleased to submit herewith, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Unaudited
Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the first quarter ended 30th June, 2022 reviewed by the Audit Committee and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their respective meetings held on 11th August, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure On Related Party Transaction Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations & Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 (As Amended)
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure  Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended on 31st March, 2022.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter & Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2022
data.news_body: With reference to above, we are pleased to submit herewith, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter & year ended 31st March, 2022. Further note that the Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion in this regards, reviewed by the Audit Committee and subsequent approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their respective meetings held on 28th May, 2022

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Summary Of Proceedings At Meeting Of The Board Of Directors Held On Saturday, 30Th October, 2021
data.news_body: With reference to above and as per intimations given for meeting of the Board of Directors, we are pleased to inform that above referred meeting was held on 30th October, 2021 and had considered and approved the business items apart from other agenda items circulated for the meeting as mentioned in the attachment.

data.caption: Submission Of Unaudited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company And Limited Review Report For The First Quarter Ended 30Th June, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to above, we are pleased to submit herewith, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the first quarter ended 30th June, 2021 reviewed by the Audit Committee and subsequently approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their respective meetings held on 31st July, 2021. Also enclosed Limited Review Report of the said Unaudited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company.

You are requested to take note of the same.

data.caption: Submission Of Disclosure On Related Party Transaction Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit the attached disclosure on Related Party Transactions of the Company for the half year ended on 31st March, 2021, in accordance with the applicable accounting standards.

You are requested to take note of the same.

data.caption: Submission Of Audited Standalone And Consolidated Financial Results Of The Company For The Quarter & Financial Year Ended 31St March, 2021
data.news_body:
With reference to above, we are pleased to submit herewith, pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, Audited
Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter & year ended 31st March, 2021. Further note that the Statutory Auditors of the Company have issued audit reports with unmodified opinion in this regards, reviewed by the Audit Committee and subsequent approved by the Board of Directors of the Company at their respective meetings held on 22nd May, 2021.

You are requested to take note of the same.
